name: Jacquie Lawson Country Cottage
description:
Introducing our most exciting product yet—the Jacquie Lawson Country Cottage. Design and decorate your own idyllic virtual home deep in the English countryside.

Features
• Indulge your interior decorating skills to create the imaginary home of your dreams.
• Have fun playing popular games, then spend the rewards you earn on new furniture and decorative features.
• Send beautiful ecards to your family and friends from your very own writing desk within the app.
• Add extra rooms and garden areas to your Country Cottage with expansion packs that will be available for purchase each season.

Start experiencing the picturesque wonderland of Jacquie Lawson today! You don’t have to be a paid subscriber: just download and log in or create a free membership. The Jacquie Lawson Country Cottage is totally free for you to download and enjoy.


Games to Play
Popular classics and new favourites, such as Klondike Solitaire and 10 x 10, are perfect for whiling away a lazy day – and while you play, you’ll earn rewards to spend on your interior décor!


Design and Decorate
Indulge the interior decorator in you! Choose soft furnishings and other home décor items. Mix and match beautiful fabrics, rich textures, patterns and colour schemes.

Earn Rewards
Games and other activities earn you reward points, which you can use to improve your country cottage. Anything from lampshades to landscaping!

Stay Connected
You’ll also have your own writing desk where you can send ecards to your friends and family. Choose from a range of stationery designs to suit every recipient.

Expansions

Summer Garden (expected release in July 2021)
When summer arrives, you’ll want to spend time in the garden, so we’ll
have a brand-new Summer Garden expansion pack for you. Design a beautiful outdoor space to complement your cottage interior, with borders
full of colourful flowers and lush foliage!

Kitchen Expansion (release date not yet set)
Your Country Cottage will gain a kitchen! You’ll be able to equip it with beautiful handmade kitchen units and a lovely range cooker, and of course choose stylish colours and materials for your floor and wall coverings.


More expansion packs to come!
And there’s more to come. Full details will be announced in our regular newsletters, so be sure to subscribe to keep up to date.
